settings.text: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.

custom_css: .banner__heading.inline-richtext.h1 {color: #ffffff; font-weight: bold; text-transform: uppercase; line-height: 1.125em; font-size: 64px;}

settings.text:
Duywellery is an independent family jeweller with over 40 years of experience and expertise in the beautiful world of jewellery. We are passionate about offering the highest quality of service, and our knowledge guarantees you and your precious jewellery will be exceptionally cared for.

We specialize in the finest quality jewellery repairs, remodelling, and custom designs. We take pride in offering a one-on-one, personalized design service that combines exceptional workmanship with meticulous attention to detaill. Immerse yourself in a seamless and educational experience toward the perfect engagement ring as we guide you through the entire process, from start to finish, ensuring your vision becomes a reality.

As Australia’s Premier Online and Australasian Award-Winning Jewellery Retailer, Duywellery is far more than a store−it is an experience. Enjoy shopping in style at our beautiful boutique store located on the Gold Coast, or shop with us online 24/7. Our extensive range of fine jewellery includes signature collections of yellow, white, and rose gold, in addition to hand-picked precious gemstone and pearl pieces.

Feel free to email us for some personal advice, it’s what we do best. We are available to help you source a specific piece of jewellery, or loose diamond, or to guide you through the process of deciding exactly what is right for that special someone− maybe even yourself! You can email us at

service@duywellery.com

Enjoy!

Linh.
